page.title: 15Recreation _ Playing Field
page.content: There are two playing fields in Swinderby.One is situated off the High Street and is a play area with swings and see _ saw.The second area is a Playing Field situated in Station Road.There is a full size football pitch on which play the Swinderby teams.There are home and away dressing rooms and toilet facilities.There are also swings which are in disrepair at the present time.The Parish Council own the field but the upkeep is in the hands of the football club.This body cuts the grass and keeps the field in a good state.During the season two games are played on the field each week.The area is kept in good condition,well drained and the field is playable throughout the whole of the winter months.
